data_science_framework.data_spy.loggers.experiment_loggers.data_saver(f: Callable) → Callable[source]¶

Decorator that saves data of a function

Parameters

f – Function under study

Returns

Decorated function

data_science_framework.data_spy.loggers.experiment_loggers.global_logger(folder: str, project_root: str, tag: str = 'experiment', test: bool = False) → Callable[source]¶

Function that logs the experiments parameters and the output of the experiment

Parameters

  • folder – Path to the folder that contains the experiments

  • project_root – Root of the project (for github logs)

  • tag – Tag associated with the experiment

  • test – Boolean that is true only if the experiment is a test

Returns

Decorator to apply above the experiment function under study
